tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: I had a failed dental procedure 10 years ago done somewhere in pune..that experience was so painful that I never visited a dentist again and suffered the problem. After being recommended by some freinds I finally visited dental 360 recently and to my surprise and releif the doctors here are just amazing..I would say the painless doctors I ever met..thank you dental 360 for the releif that you have bought to me..absolutely satisfied with treatment. @ Dear doctors, I appreciate your caring nature and patience..thank you so much..always recommended..

review: My treatment cost was increased in the middle of my procedure. I was on the the chair  with my mouth open and my doctor informed me that the price just went up.  I was in no position to discuss or talk through as my first 2 seatings were already done with them and I was there for permanent filling.
